plot outline: An educated villege master came to the city and was appointed as a the principal in a college.He has a boy name Priyo (Siddhant). There are the anti-social men namely Pappu and Swro Samajpati. They are fighting each other in gang wars in the city. Bant,i the son of Pappu murdered a man.
title: Sahar Jwolchhe
plot: An educated villege master came to the city and was appointed as a the principal in a college.He has a boy name Priyo (Siddhant). There are the anti-social men namely Pappu and Swro Samajpati. They are fighting each other in gang wars in the city. Bant,i the son of Pappu murdered a man.
